title.narrative: Centre Ariadna: preventing family violence by working with victims and rehabilitation of aggressors

description.narrative: This is a continuation project called Centre Ariadna: preventing family violence by working with victims and rehabilitation of aggressors which focuses on preventing and combating violence against women in Moldovia by providing safe services where victims of domestic violence will receive temporary shelter social psychological and legal assistance to meet the urgent needs of women and children. It will also work with multidisciplinary team members in northern Moldova for identification reference early inter vention and provision of quality services to beneficiaries to avoid repetition of cases of domestic violence. The project will provide comprehensive and long-term reintegration of victims of domestic violence in Moldovia. In addition the project will provi de rehabilitation of the domestic aggressors in order to break the cycle of violence. The long-term goal of this project is to contribute to changing the Moldovia mentality on the issues of domestic violence as being the most serious form of violence again st women and children. To prevent acts of domestic violence it is not enough to work only with victims it is necessary to work with family abusers too in order to empower the positive behaviours manifested in family relationships. This project proposes t o intervene by providing relevant counselling and assistance services for domestic aggressors too. Another important aspect is to develop activities to prevent domestic violence at the community level. Mobile team consisting of a social worker psychologis t and lawyer will move into the territory to work with the multidisciplinary teams of the community (community social worker police officer doctor) to identify provide social psychological and legal services, as well as monitoring and evaluation of the ass isted cases. The victims of domestic violence women and children who are not safe in the territory will be placed in the Maternal Center in order to overcome the crisis and finding alternative solutions for them. Victims will be assisted in completing appl ications for the issuance of protection orders so that family abusers will be accountable on violent behaviour towards family members. Abusers will be referred to the center of family assistance and counselling to attend training in the rehabilitation prog ram of family aggressors. There is a signed agreement between some Moldovan ministries regarding the domestic violence addressing sustainability on these issues.
